name: YouTube 2017 - Fade watched videos Legacy Version
description: This is legacy version of my 'YouTube 2017 - Fade watched videos' userstyle. Enhances the readability of your subscriptions by dimming (fading out) videos you have already watched. Very simple little change, but helps a lot to distinct what to watch next. It's made for latest Youtube's Material Design layout. Enjoy. Please, consider using my original version of YouTube 2017 - Fade watched videos.
